name: Night Reverie
description:
Night Reverie is a Puzzle/Adventure game in which a child must solve the mystery behind the distortion of his house. Enjoy a variety of dream-like environments and discover the truth behind the distortion of the house. There must be an answer to all of this and a way to return things back to normal.

Explore a house filled with unique environments only seen in dreams
Interact with a unique cast of characters and engage in conversations to discover more about the world
